description:
"My wish as champion is for you to descend the tower and be my wife."

Seeking to end a curse thwarting his lineage, Prince Oscar sets out on a quest that leads him to a powerful and beautiful witch, Tinasha, and he demands a unique bargain: marriage. Though unenthused by the proposal, she agrees to stay in his castle for a year while researching the spell cast upon him. But beneath her beauty lies a lifetime of dark secrets that soon come to light.

(Source: Yen Press, Crunchyroll)
synonyms: アンネームドメモリー
อันเนมด์ เมโมรี

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Archery
tags.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Curses
tags.description: Features a character, object or area that has been cursed, usually by a malevolent supernatural force.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

alternative: The Witch of the Azure Moon

name.native: オスカー・ファルサス

node.description: **Miura Kazuya** is a Japanese director, episode director, animator, animation supervisor, animation director and storyboard artist.

__[Blog (JP)](http://forte-piano.net/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nijine)__

__Birthplace:__ Osaka Prefecture, Japan
__Residency:__ Tokyo, Japan
__Graduated:__ Nana Prefectural Sakurai Senior High School (2001), Osaka College of Music (2004)

__Introduction:__
Akito Matsuda, also known by his alias Nijine, is a Japanese composer and arranger. He worked freelance as a composer and arranger until his employment with Popholic found place in 2007.

__Biography:__
Akito is mainly known for working under the name Nijine, which he did between 2006 through 2012, where he wrote the soundtracks for a handful of anime while also composing and arranging various anime songs. In 2013, he decided to start using his real name for his work instead. He is also known for working on several eroge soundtracks and vocal songs under the name Tokia (stylized as TOKIA) early on in his career.

[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

[Official Website](https://arika.bitfan.id/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Arika_official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/_arika.official_/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@arikaofficialchannel/featured)

They are a duet consisting of voice actress [Yuuko Natsuyoshi](https://anilist.co/staff/136272/Yuuko-Natsuyoshi) and composer [Yamato](https://anilist.co/staff/156665/Yamato).

__Height:__ 155cm 

**[Agency Profile](http://www.kenproduction.co.jp/talent/member.php?mem=W135) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/__yuuuumr__)**


**Non anime roles:**
- Kyoyama Kazusa - Blue Archive (Video Game)
- Sabrina - Granblue Fantasy (Video Game)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/raku_tayori) 

He is part of the music group trio tayori, known as Islet prior to isui joining.
